roleset.name: to make a mess of, a mistake
roleset.note: SCREW_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'screw_up' based on WSJ; adjectival 'screwed_up' based on BOLT-2,3. No Vncls. (from screw.01-v)
SCREWUP-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry screw.01 (screw up). No VN Class, FN Bungling. (from screwup.01-n)
SCREWED_UP-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from screwed.01-j)

example.name: screw_up-v: intransitive
example.text: Mr. Dahl , a registered representative in the insurance business , said [0] he `` screwed up '' because he did n't realize [0]he was breaking securities laws .
example.arg: because he did n't realize [0] he was breaking securities laws

example.name: screw_up-v: passive
example.text: `` [The highway system]-1 is screwed [*-1]up '' by the earthquake , Mr. Engelken said [0] [*T*-2] .

example.name: screwed_up-j
example.text: I would like to see people who criticize the occupy protestors for not having a plan to fix the already falling system come up with an idea to improve things ... but things are so screwed up it s much easier said than done .

example.name: screwup-n: Sports, all args
example.text: There was a virtual consumer revolt over their screwups of the AFC and NFC championship games.
example.arg: of the AFC and NFC championship games

roleset.name: to have (unpleasant) sex with, maybe metaphorically
roleset.note: SCREW-V NOTES: Roleset based on usages in ULA-MASC1-rest; adjectival 'screwed' based on BOLT-4,5. No relevant VN entry. Framed by Claire. (from screw.02-v)
SCREWED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from screwed.02-j)

example.name: screw-v: Meta-example
example.text: Two of the more common examples of British-American divergence of usage are *PRO* screw and knock up .

example.name: screwed-j
example.text: The economy is screwed , we do n't know how to unscrew it , and inflation is about the only tool we 've got to manipulate it .

roleset.name: secure or fasten; attach
roleset.note: SCREW-V NOTES: Based on sentences in callhome1. Comparison to tape.01. VN class tape-22.4. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from screw.04-v)

example.name: screw-v: Weird telephone conversation
example.text: you screwed this whole motor suction party on to something

roleset.name: give someone the shaft; cheat thoroughly
roleset.note: SCREW_OVER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from screw.05-v)

example.name: screw_over-v: both args
example.text: Fortunately we have things like the Khan Academy now that are going *-2 to seriously screw those monopolistic selfish bastards over .
